headline: Consumer Cos. Up, But not by Much, Amid Lackluster Sales Growth -- Consumer Roundup
summary: Consumer companies rose, but not by as much as the broad market, amid lackluster retail sales growth. Retail sales rose 0.2% in February, short of the average economist target of 0.6%. Retail...
